data.subjects: a 20yo man, a woman in her 40s
data.pose_action: The man stands looking at the woman who is seated on a lounge. He walks and sits down next to her. He puts a hand on her shoulder and reaches for her hand
data.camera: shot on a 22mm lens on Arri Alexa
data.framing_action: The camera starts 5m away from our subjects and dollies in. We start close to the ground at 1' close in at 2' from their faces
data.grading: the color should look like captured on a Fuji Xperia film

metadata.description: Example hotel lobby scene with romantic interaction
